questionTitle: Take this road and you will ________ at the hotel in five minutes.
Oh no! When I was cooking these vegetables, I must have forgotten ________ any salt in.
They talked for three days before finally ________ to a decision.
My uncle is great. In our family, he's ________ his cooking.
The new manager explained to the staff that he hoped to ________ new procedures to save time and money.
The accident was your fault - you ________ have been driving so fast.
Do you really believe in the ________ of the evil eye?
Tell me ________ what happened after Jennings hit the Minister.
Several of the trees in the park were ________.
My parents ________ that they will move to the seaside when my father retries next year.
Are you telling me that this shirt costs $100? You ________ be joking!
At a dinner to mark his retirement, Neville was ________ with a silver clock.
Scientists everywhere are trying to ________ a cure for AIDS.
This passport is valid ________ all countries except China.
He congratulated me ________ having got engaged.
Don't write ________ the desk!
Don't blame me ________ the accident!
We are fortunate ________ having sufficient supplies of fuel for the winter.
When I came in he ________ to repair his TV set.
The falling inflation rate is ________ to a decrease in the amount of borrowing.
